name: Kamiini
overview:
Kamiini will design, develop, implement and staff your business projects using our flexible global cost containment models that fit your business needs. Kamiini’s customers are small to fortune companies and government agencies. Our focus is in manufacturing, health care and service organizations. Kamiini’s business proposition is to create value for individuals and businesses by applying innovative ideas, talents and professional experiences that create time and financial freedom for individuals and companies.
We help businesses locate highly skilled IT professional with experience in:

  • Desktop Support
  • Web Development
  • Software Development
  • Data/Database Management
  • Internet/Intranet
  • Systems Integration
  • Security
  • Infrastructure Management
  • Project Management
  • Business Analysis We help businesses optimize their processes through process automation and the application of Lean principles to eliminate wastes. We develop manufacturing execution systems, supply chain management systems and automate your business processes. We provide expert consulting services in the areas of business re-ingineering, Sox compliance, busines process robustness, and Lean manufacturing.
